attributes.long-description:
It’s June 1977, and any day now the passage of the Keene Act will outlaw all masked vigilantes not sanctioned by the government. Rorschach has uncovered a mysterious missing person’s case and with the help of Nite Owl the pair sets out to find the young girl. Their search takes them deep into the depraved, sleazy corners of the city and eventually face-to-face with the mysterious Twilight Lady, leading to a conflict of interest between the partners. Play the videogame and experience the next saga in Watchmen's unlawful brand of justice in this long-form downloadable game.
